channel.title: Mexico on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Mexico on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: I-8 East Approaching Exit 166
item.description: I-8 east approaching Exit 166. Use Exit 166 for CA-186 to Mexico.

item.title: I-8 East Approaching Exit 166
item.description: I-8 east approaching Exit 166 - CA-186/Algodones Road/Andrade. Use CA-186 south for access to the Algodones Port of Entry with Mexico. The Port of Entry is closed from 10 PM to 6 AM.

item.title: I-19 South - Weapons Illegal In Mexico
item.description: Bilingual warning about prohibition of weapons and ammunition in Mexico on I-19 south. There is another warning further south on I-19.

item.title: CA-186 South - Weapons/Ammo Illegal In Mexico
item.description: Weapons and Ammunition Illegal in Mexico on CA-186 south approaching Mexico customs.

item.title: End CA-186 South - Mexico Customs
item.description: End CA-186 south at Mexico customs.
